info.title: Qoala Claim API
info.description:
# Introduction

Welcome to the Qoala API! Our API provides you with access to the Qoala platform, allowing you to perform actions like creating policies across various product categories and submitting new claims, among other functionalities.
For your convenience, we have included a straightforward example in the payload to assist you in seamlessly integrating with our platform. You can also find code examples in the shaded area on the right.
If you have any inquiries or need assistance with our API, please do not hesitate to contact our dedicated developer support team. We are here to assist you!

# Product Categories

Qoala, functioning as an insurance broker, offers a diverse range of insurance products that encompass various functionalities and benefits. Consequently, we have organized these products into distinct groups based on their corresponding functions. There are four primary categories into which we classify these products:

1. Travel
The Travel category encompasses the following subcategories:

- Flight
- Train
- Bus
- Hotel
- Experience

2. Gadget
The Gadget category includes the following subcategories:

- Smartphone
- Electronic

3. Finance

4. Health

>It's important to note that Finance and Health do not have any subcategories at this time.

# Host

Environment|Host Address
------------- | -------------
Staging|https://api-staging.qoala.app
Production|https://api.qoala.app

# Authentication

Qoala Partnership utilizes API keys to grant access to the API. You can request a new API key from Qoala Engineering. 
Qoala Partnership requires the API key to be included in the header of all API requests made to our services. The header should appear as follows:
`x-api-key: abcdefg`

> To use the x-api-key, refer to the example below:

```shell
curl --location --request {METHOD} '{{HOST_URL}}' \
--header 'x-api-key: abcdefg' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data-raw '{}'
```

> Make sure to replace `abcdefg` with your API key.

tags.name: API Specification
tags.description: Claim API documentation consist of create claim, get claim detail or status, claim cancellation and claim pool detail or update claim documents

post.description:
Partners could use this endpoint to generate and create a new claim. Qoala will validate and make sure the policy is claimable. Qoala will share the claim number in the response and if needed could also notify the partner via callback Integration.
### List of Claim Status

| Status Code                | Claim Status (Subject)          | Description                                     |
| --------------------------- | ------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------- |
| `CLAIM_INITIATE`            | Claim initiated                 | When the claimer successfully submitted a claim |
| `QOALA_CLAIM_APPROVE`       | Claim received by Qoala         | Qoala approved the claim                        |
| `QOALA_CLAIM_REJECT`        | Claim rejected by Qoala         | Qoala rejects the claim                         |
| `INSURANCE_CLAIM_APPROVE`   | Claim approved by Insurance      | Insurance approved the claim                    |
| `INSURANCE_CLAIM_REJECT`    | Claim rejected by Insurance      | Insurance rejected the claim                    |
| `INSURANCE_CLAIM_PAID`      | Claim paid by Insurance           | Claim already paid by insurance                 |
| `INSURANCE_CLAIM_WAITING_PAID` | Claim Waiting paid            | Claim already approved by insurance and waiting for paid |

Each status code corresponds to a specific claim status, providing information about the state of the claim in the system.

error_code.description:
qoala system error code for error classification
    
### List of Error Code detail

|Error Code | HTTP Status | Description|
|----------|-------------|------------|
|CLAIM-CREATE-001 | 400 | Invalid Body request|
|CLAIM-CREATE-003 | 400 | Policy Not Available|
|CLAIM-CREATE-004 | 400 | Product Not Found|
|CLAIM-CREATE-006 | 400 | Failed claim Reach maximum Limitation|
|CLAIM-CREATE-007 | 400 | Invalid Time|
|CLAIM-CREATE-018 | 400 | Benefit Code Not Valid|

user_channel.description: Channel where the claim comes from

partner_claim_id.description: Unique claim identifier generated by the partner system

policy_number.description: Unique policy number generated by the Qoala system

claim_additional_info.description: Claim additional info only applicable for specific product category

loan_id.description: partner transaction number or loan id // required for Credit Insurance with reinstatement product

borrower_name.description: Borrower name // required for Credit Insurance with reinstatement product

beneficiary_name.description: Beneficiary or lender name // required for Credit Insurance with reinstatement product

last_payment_date.description: last payment date, if the loan hasnt been paid or loan is less than 30 days please put loan start date // required for Credit Insurance with reinstatement product

last_collection_date.description: last collection date from the partner // required for Credit Insurance with reinstatement product

requestBody.description: Payload for creating claim // required for Credit Insurance with reinstatement product

claim_number.description: unique identifier for claim created by qoala system

reason.description: explain the reason for cancellation briefly

claim_number.description: claim unique number generated by qoala system
unique identifier for claim created by qoala system

requestBody.description: Payload for creating presigned url claim

claim_number.description: claim unique number generated by qoala system

requestBody.description: Payload for creating presigned url claim

get.description: this endpoint can be used by the partner to get the claim pool balance

code.description: unique code for certain claim pool

partner_code.description: partner code associated for certain claim pool

insurance_code.description: insurance code associated for certain claim pool

total_pending_claim_amount.description: Total approved claim but haven't been disbursed (will be disburse in the next day)

total_claim_amount.description: Total claim pool has been claimed

products_code.description: List of products associated with this claim pool code

created_at.description: when the claim pool is created

updated_at.description: when the last update claim pool

parameters.name: claim_pool_code
parameters.description: Claim Pool code generated by Qoala

parameters.name: policy_number
parameters.description: Unique identifier for policy generated by qoala system. Policy number is optinal parameter only if claim number is provided in the URL.

parameters.name: claim_number
parameters.description: Unique identifier for claim created by qoala system. Claim number is optional parameter only if policy number is provided in the URL

file_name.description: name of the fale, you can provide the filename include its extention.

type.description: type of document, it is just constant value that categorize of the document.

url.description: full url to access the document, this is should be public url

full_name.description: fullname of booker or policy holder

email.description: email of booker or policy holder, this email will receive policy certificate

phone_number.description: phone number started with country code but without “+” sign Only accept numeric characters

birth_date.description: birth date information in format yyyy-mm-dd

relationship.description: relationship of user within group of insured user in one transaction

covered_type_max.description: maximum number of covered period or tenure

carrier.description: Name of carrier that provide shipping service example: JNE, FEDEX, etc

identity_number.description: Unique value as identifier number to differentiate each shipping

service.description: Type of service offered by shipping provide

estimated_delivery_time.description: Time estimation when the package will be received by the recipient

identity_number.description: Unique value as identifier number to differentiate each product

filename.description: name of the file, you can provide the filename include its extention.

type.description: type of document, it is just constant value that categorize of the document.

url.description: full url to access the document, this is should be public url

status.description: status of response, it will contain success

message.description: short message explains about the success response

partner_transaction_number.description: The transaction ID serves as a unique identifier for each transaction initiated through the API. Partners are responsible for generating this ID and ensuring its uniqueness across their transactions.

transaction_number.description: Unique transaction number generated in qoala system

product_code.description: Defined by Qoala, plays a pivotal role in the API, providing contextual information about certain aspects of the product. However, as of now, the details for this field will be shared at a later stage when the product is ready for testing.

items.description: policy information contains about its identifier, status and so on.

number.description: unique identifier for policy which is autogenerated by qoala system

status.description: status of policy, we have set of statuses but we can support mapping status from partner if needed.

start_protection_at.description: Field serves to designate when protection begins. It holds a time value presented in the ISO 8601 date format, guaranteeing uniformity across systems.

end_protection_at.description: Field serves to designate the conclusion of protection. It holds a time value presented in the ISO 8601 date format, guaranteeing uniformity across systems.

documents.description: information regarding to policy document like certificate and policy wording stated by insurer
